original_text: that he may establish you today as his people, and that he may be your God, as he promised you, and as he swore to your fathers, to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob.
korean_text: 여호와께서 네게 말씀하신 대로 또 네 조상 아브라함과 이삭과 야곱에게 맹세하신 대로 오늘 너를 세워 자기 백성을 삼으시고 그는 친히 네 하나님이 되시려 함이니라

sentences.original_text: that he may establish you today as his people
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너희를 오늘 그의 백성으로 세우려는 것은

sentences.original_text: and that he may be your God
and as he swore to your fathers
to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob.
